original_text: He shall not make himself unclean for his father, or for his mother, for his brother, or for his sister, when they die: because the consecration of his God is upon his head.
korean_text: 그의 부모 형제 자매가 죽은 때에라도 그로 말미암아 몸을 더럽히지 말 것이니 이는 자기의 몸을 구별하여 하나님께 드리는 표가 그의 머리에 있음이라

sentences.original_text: He shall not make himself unclean
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신을 부정하게 만들지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: for his father, or for his mother
for his brother, or for his sister
because the consecration of his God
